brief_summary.textblock: As a collaborative project between American Heart Association, Chinese Society of Cardiology, American Diabetes Association and Chinese Diabetes Society, the China Diabetes Cardiovascular Initiative aims to enhance the attention and awareness of cardiovascular health care professionals (HCPs) in the managements of cardiovascular diseases and diabetes, to reduce diabetes-related complication and minimize adverse events in patients with cardiovascular disease, and to reduce the risk of cardiovascular morbidity and mortality in diabetic patients.
